Love Hate Relationship with this game.

Love the gameplay (especially the audio design!)

Hate the game because of crashes, long queue times, matchmaking inaccuracies, and other purely logistical problems. Were the reason I stopped years ago, and are the reason I've considered leaving again. I'd really hoped they'd fix these problems with in the past 2 years.

TL;DR - Great Game, terrible logistics.
Страшно на столько что я обосрал все штаны... Иногда эта сука, кровожадная, вылетает из-за угла и тогда начинаются догонялки. Ну крч игра норм, если под рукой успокоительное.

6.7新编辑 
不建议玩，看看付导和巨色的视频过过瘾就得了。黎明杀机是我见过，这么多热门游戏里，匹配机制最垃圾的一款游戏！当你段位越来越高，你根本就排不到人，想秒排得掉段

虽然点的是推荐，但是想说的是吐槽。
唯一想说的就是匹配机制，我个人玩了40+小时，发现了个规律，白天玩人秒进，晚上玩鬼秒进。反之就是等上半小时都不一定匹得到。就他妈离谱了，这游戏steam在线好歹也是榜20，难道在线人数都是虚的？这是其一。
其二是，我一14段屠夫（都是晚上人类匹不到被迫玩） 天天晚上匹到人皇车队，我都快吐了知道吗，出来一看，不是1段带两三个17、8段的萌新，就是4个3、4段的老鸟。 我玩你妈呢？我血点全给人类，屠夫就一个叮当40级（因为叮当刷分快）。遇到那种老老实实的车队还好，遇上那种速修队修完不走还来皮的，是真痛苦（不过一般遇上了直接守尸呢）
真的，这游戏哪哪都好，对国区玩家也很重视，但是匹配机制，确实是令人诟病。
played it a lil bit, seems cool idk tho im still new

За 1.5 дня наиграл 15 часов, очень интересный геймплей и разнообразие выбора перков/манов/сурвов, у каждого свои особенности, нет преимуществ от доната, и графика очень красивая. Игра не требовательная, у меня на САМЫХ НИЗКИХ настройках (+ изменение конфига игры) идёт минимум в 25 фпс, максимум в 80. Советую к приобретению.
es muy buen juego, siempre se aprenden cosas nuevas.

Very good game. Fun to play with friends in custom-mode. 
The only thing that is bad in the game are most killers. Either they are extremely toxic, or they both tunnel and or camps. Another thing that would be cool are other gamemodes, as there are only 3 in this.

After all these years its nice to see that the game is still up and running! Dead by Daylight is one of those games that, even tough its not perfect, you keep on coming back at it due to the persistence the devs put in to make it better and better alongside the new content that comes every now and then.
dont like good perks being paywalled let alone for a game i already payed money for

Ficou uma porcaria depois das novas atualizações. No inicio do ano, segundo os números publicados pela própria behaviour, em torno de 16% de survivals conseguiam fugir, mesmo jogando em SWF, agora a maioria das perks que realmente faziam alguma diferença para survival foram nerfadas e o jogo ficou basicamente killer sided. (como se antes já nao fosse, pois se fosse minimamente equilibrado, teríamos algo entre 40 e 60%). Enfim, já até desinstalei, visto que ainda há vários bugs que simplesmente são ignorados e parece que o foco é lançar somente skins e ouvir apenas as reclamações dos que jogam de killer.
this is a mess but in a good way

Dead game. Don't bother buying this unless you enjoy getting paired against 10.000 hour, 4-man pre-made team and getting not only absolutely destroyed, but also BM'd beyond all reason. Dead By Daylight has an incompetent team of developers that IGNORED the issues presented to them on a silver platter by a huge number of players, which (SURPRISE SURPRISE) led to said chunk of the playerbase to leave the game for good. 

What will your experience in Dead By Daylight be? Well, you will face 15 minute long queue times (remember all those players that left?), that will lead to "matchmaking" pairing you, a newbie, against highest ranked players in the game that will make sure that your experience is as bad as they can manage. Want to know why? Because any sensible player left Dead By Daylight years ago and only trolls remain. 

My biggest regret when it comes to buying games will always be this pile of garbage by the name of Dead By Daylight. Don't expect things to get better, for devs to listen to the community for once and don't expect players to return or even new players remain. What you're potentially buying is a dying game that's trying to grab as much cash as possible before kicking the bucket. 

You know, I think it's time for the devs to make good on the game's title and kill it, before the next sunrise.

Confusing, and rarely fun.

Trying a match after the tutorials led to me struggling with unintuitive game mechanics. It turns out that the tutorials explained very little of the actual gameplay, so it's immersion-breaking having to deal with that confusion, and then pretty boring researching the game mechanics instead of actually playing.

I then tried to wrap my head around the entity, perks, bloodweb, offerings, auras, totems, rituals, tomes, and everything else that I'm struggling to grasp. Then there's the little quirks of the game that catch you out, like traps hitting you when you're not even near them.

Either a match gets ruined because I didn't understand something, or one of the players was just messing around. Considering that the matches can be long, and it can often take awhile for them to even start (especially if you want to play as the killer) then you spend a lot of time not really having fun.
